meanings.definition: To skate faster or better than someone else.
meanings.sent1: She was outskating her friends in the race.
meanings.sent2: He always outskates his competitors in the competition.
meanings.sent3: The little penguin was outskating the bigger ones in the icy pond.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to outskate her fears propelled her forward.
meanings.sent5: The champion outskated all doubts to reach the finish line first.

meanings.definition: The act of skating outside or beyond a certain area.
meanings.sent1: We enjoyed the outskating on the frozen lake.
meanings.sent2: The outskating event took place in the park.
meanings.sent3: The outskating session under the stars was magical.
meanings.sent4: His outskating adventures led him to discover new places.
meanings.sent5: The outskating excursion provided a refreshing break from routine.
